passage_text: 1 According to Answerbag.com, the monthly cost of a storage unit depends on the size of the unit. 2  For instance, a 5 x 5 foot storage unit costs around $40 to $50. 3  A 10 x 15 foot space runs around $75 to $150 and a 10 x 20 foot storage unit costs around $95 to $180. 1 For instance, the location or state, size or area, and specifications, among others, may have an impact on the price. 2  On average, the prices of a storage unit can range anywhere from as little as $25 to as much as $250 per month.
